languages.text: "Вил'Маражай... как мог{mf||ла} ты принять его в ряды своих верных? Он уже запустил когти в твою душу. Я чувствую его скверну в тебе. Вырви эту потаенную иглу, через которую он изопьет твою душу до дна".

traits.locale_text: "Тэй'Маражай... как мог{mf||ла} ты принять его в ряды своих верных? Он уже запустил свои когти в твою душу... я чувствую его скверну в тебе. Вырви эту потаенную иглу, через которую он изопьет твою душу до дна".

languages.text: "Vil'Marazhai... How could you accept him into your faithful host? Already he has sunk his claws into your soul. I can feel his venom within you. Tear out this treacherous needle, or he will drink your soul to the last drop."
languages.original_text: "Вил'Маражай... как мог{mf||ла} ты принять его в ряды своих верных? Он уже запустил когти в твою душу. Я чувствую его скверну в тебе. Вырви эту потаенную иглу, через которую он изопьет твою душу до дна".

traits.locale_text: "Tei'Marazhai... How could you accept him into your faithful host? Already he has sunk his claws into your soul. I can feel his venom within you. Tear our this treacherous needle, or he will drink your soul to the last drop."

"Tei'Marazhai... How could you accept him into your faithful host? Already he has sunk his claws into your soul. I can feel his venom within you. Tear our this treacherous needle, or he will drink your soul to the last drop."

"Vil'Marazhai... How could you accept him into your faithful host? Already he has sunk his claws into your soul. I can feel his venom within you. Tear out this treacherous needle, or he will drink your soul to the last drop."

languages.text: «Vil'Marazhai... ¿cómo pudo aceptarlo en su séquito de fieles? Tiene las zarpas clavadas en su alma. Puedo notar su ponzoña dentro de usted. Arránquese ese traicionero aguijón o beberá de su alma hasta dejarla seca».
languages.original_text: "Vil'Marazhai... How could you accept him into your faithful host? Already he has sunk his claws into your soul. I can feel his venom within you. Tear out this treacherous needle, or he will drink your soul to the last drop."

traits.locale_text: «Vil'Marazhai... ¿cómo pudo aceptarlo en su séquito de fieles? Tiene las zarpas clavadas en su alma. Puedo notar su ponzoña dentro de usted. Arránquese ese traicionero aguijón o beberá de su alma hasta dejarla seca».

languages.text: 「マラズハイ…どうして彼を忠実な宿主として受け入れることができたの？彼は既にあなたの魂に爪を立てている。私には、あなたの中の、彼の毒を感じる。この裏切りの張りを引きちぎりなさい。さもないと、彼はあなたの魂の最後のひとしずくまで飲み干すわ」
languages.original_text: "Vil'Marazhai... How could you accept him into your faithful host? Already he has sunk his claws into your soul. I can feel his venom within you. Tear out this treacherous needle, or he will drink your soul to the last drop."

traits.locale_text: 「マラズハイ…どうして彼を忠実な宿主として受け入れることができたの？彼は既にあなたの魂に爪を立てている。私には、あなたの中の、彼の毒を感じる。この裏切りの張りを引きちぎりなさい。さもないと、彼はあなたの魂の最後のひとしずくまで飲み干すわ」

languages.text: “敌者玛拉斋……你怎么能允许他留在你身边呢？他已经将利爪伸进了你的灵魂，我能感觉到他留在你体内的毒液。快拔掉这根阴险的尖针吧，否则他会把你的灵魂榨得一滴不剩。”
languages.original_text: "Vil'Marazhai... How could you accept him into your faithful host? Already he has sunk his claws into your soul. I can feel his venom within you. Tear out this treacherous needle, or he will drink your soul to the last drop."

traits.locale_text: “敌者玛拉斋……你怎么能允许他留在你身边呢？他已经将利爪伸进了你的灵魂，我能感觉到他留在你体内的毒液。快拔掉这根阴险的尖针吧，否则他会把你的灵魂榨得一滴不剩。”

languages.text: "Vil'Marazhai ... Wie konntet Ihr ihn als treuen Gastgeber akzeptieren? Er hat bereits seine Klauen in Eure Seele geschlagen. Ich spüre sein Gift in Euch. Reißt diese gefährliche Nadel heraus, sonst trinkt er Eure Seele bis zum letzten Tropfen."
languages.original_text: "Vil'Marazhai... How could you accept him into your faithful host? Already he has sunk his claws into your soul. I can feel his venom within you. Tear out this treacherous needle, or he will drink your soul to the last drop."

traits.locale_text: "Vil'Marazhai ... Wie konntet Ihr ihn als treuen Gastgeber akzeptieren? Er hat bereits seine Klauen in Eure Seele geschlagen. Ich spüre sein Gift in Euch. Reißt diese gefährliche Nadel heraus, sonst trinkt er Eure Seele bis zum letzten Tropfen."

languages.text: « Vil'Marazhai... Comment avez-vous pu l'accueillir dans votre cercle de fidèles ? Il a d'ores et déjà planté ses griffes dans votre âme. Je sens son venin se répandre en vous. Débarrassez-vous au plus vite de cette aiguille perfide, ou il vous consumera jusqu'à la dernière goutte. »
languages.original_text: "Vil'Marazhai... How could you accept him into your faithful host? Already he has sunk his claws into your soul. I can feel his venom within you. Tear out this treacherous needle, or he will drink your soul to the last drop."

traits.locale_text: « Vil'Marazhai... Comment avez-vous pu l'accueillir dans votre cercle de fidèles ? Il a d'ores et déjà planté ses griffes dans votre âme. Je sens son venin se répandre en vous. Débarrassez-vous au plus vite de cette aiguille perfide, ou il vous consumera jusqu'à la dernière goutte. »

languages.original_text: "Vil'Marazhai... How could you accept him into your faithful host? Already he has sunk his claws into your soul. I can feel his venom within you. Tear out this treacherous needle, or he will drink your soul to the last drop."

languages.text: "Vil'Marazhai... Nasıl oldu da onu dini bütün maiyetine aldın? Şimdiden pençesini ruhuna geçirmeyi başarmış. İçine damlattığı zehri sezebiliyorum. Bu hain dikeni söküp atmazsan ruhunu son damlasına kadar emecek."
languages.original_text: "Vil'Marazhai... How could you accept him into your faithful host? Already he has sunk his claws into your soul. I can feel his venom within you. Tear out this treacherous needle, or he will drink your soul to the last drop."
